name: Puto of War
description:
[Info]

This game was developed in one week for the TGMBR JAM#5 , created in collaboration with Dot_chaos.

[History]

Somewhere in the icy Soviet tundra, the codename agent PUTO infiltrates a base where advanced combat technology is suspected to be being developed.

CONTROLSArrow keys
MoveZJumpXShotCThrow grenade

Xbox 360 controller supported!
